column1: The shoes arrived early(Oct 20th) The fit is fine. Great seller and great communication. Great price even with shipping cost.
Great seller. Excellent communication and so easy to deal with. Package arrived much sooner than expected.
Great boots, super fast shipping and well packaged. Exactly as described and promised. I highly recommend this seller. Thanks again :-)
Product was as ordered; delivery on time and the product was carefully packaged

This seller , londonvgventures , is very responsive and helpful. I never had anyone before from any online store react this fast to my questions for product info and shipping info. It was a pleasure making a purchase - great seller , perfect product, excellent shipping - a winning combination.
Item arrived promptly and well packaged. Seller has great communication. Thank you.
Item just as described, arrived well packed.
